name: Dualichrome
description:
Dualichrome is a 3D color-based puzzle game developed in about 6 hours for the Global Game Jam 2022.

The player must find the path to the bullseye door while only seeing two randomized colors at once. Use mouse-click to switch colors. Listen to a wonderful 2-toned hum that correlates with each set of colors.

Level Designer: Brian Heagney
Audio Designer: Brian Heagney
Programmer: Brian Heagney
